message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Considering its worth and the impact it can have, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional product.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price of $15000. Would it be possible to negotiate a price closer to $12000? I believe this would be more in line with what I can afford while still allowing me to benefit from the product's features.
